remarks: Closure of orthogonal sum.  If ` X ` and ` Y ` are orthogonal closed projective subspaces, then their sum is closed.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
osumcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
osumcl.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
osumcl.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
osumclN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C /\ Y e. C ) /\ X C_ ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. C ) $.
